namuth pasugiyada thaman wisinma padinchi karawana lada sinhala pirisakata (mahinda rajapakshata jandaya dima pinisa) janda balaya illa ehimiyan wisin sanwidhanaya karana lada udghoshanayata polis praharayak ella karawa ganimata samath wimen sumanarathana himi eka rayin wirayaku bawata path wiya.

aanduwe pirisak horu samanga dil dama athi bawatada samaja katha bahak athi wiya.horunta erehiwa kriya kirimata aanduwa dakwu udasinathwaya sambandhawa janatha aprasadaya pasugiya palath palana mathiwarana prathipala thulinda dakagatha haki wiya.wancha,dushana ha minis ghathana chodana ellawa siti piris aanduwata elipita abhiyoga karannata wuye mema pasubima thulaya.thamanta erehiwa aanduwa karana chodana kisiwak sathya eewa nowana bawath me siyalla deshapalana paliganim sandaha karanu labana abhutha chodana bawath chodanawalata lakwuwan pawasaddi ek paththakin janathawada eya anumatha karana bawak daknata labini.barapathala wancha,dushana,sorakam pilibandawa waga wibhaga kirima sandaha wishesha adhikaranayak pihituwima pinisa adhikarana sanwidhana( sanshodhana) panath ketumpathak parlimenthuwata idiripath kerenne mema pasubima thulaya.eya parlimenthuwe sammatha kara ganimata niyamithawa thibena athara mewana wita deshapalana paksha ha widwathun adala panatha sambandhawa wiwidha matha palakarannata patan gena thibe.maha parimana wancha ha dushana sambandha nadu wibhagayata noganima sambandhawa janathawage barapathala wiwechanayak thibena bawa kawuruth piliganna sathyayaki.
